alert.note: Alert for El Paso; Hudspeth (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued October 10 at 10:43PM CDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY. THE TYLER POLICE DEPARTMENT IS SEARCHING FOR AUDREY LEE, A WHITE, FEMALE, Who is 7 YEARS OLD, and is 3 FEET 0 INCHES tall. She weighs 40 POUNDS and has BROWN HAIR, BLUE EYES and was LAST SEEN WEARING A MUSTARD COLORED SHIRT AND LIGHT COLOR BLUE JEANS. Police are also looking for ELLA LEE, a WHITE, FEMALE, who is 9 YEARS OLD and is 4 FEET 0 INCHES tall. She weighs 60 POUNDS and has BROWN HAIR, BROWN EYES, and was LAST SEEN WEARING A TAN SHIRT WITH BLACK LETTERING, BLACK SHORTS, AND BABY BLUE HIGH TOP CONVERSE SHOES. POLICE ARE LOOKING FOR CHASE LEE, a 33 YEARS OLD, who is a WHITE, MALE, who is 5 FEET 11 INCHES, and weighs 170 POUNDS. He has BROWN HAIR and BLUE EYES AND LAST SEEN WEARING A LIGHT-COLORED SHIRT, BLUE JEANS, AND KHAKI COLORed HEY DUDE SHOES, IN CONNECTION WITH THEIR ABDUCTION. THE SUSPECT IS DRIVING A WHITE, 2007, CHEVROLET, AVALANCHE WITH BLACK TRIM WITH SEVERAL GALVESTON BEACH ACCESS STICKERS ON THE FRONT WINDSHIELD. The vehicle is BEARING Texas LICENSE PLATE NUMBER D X V 6 6 9 5. LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS BELIEVE THESE CHILDREN TO BE IN GRAVE danger please contact the TYLER POLICE DEPARTMENT AT (903)531-1000 if you have any information.
